Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell research and development has faced challenges with slow startup, slow shutdown and a limited number of thermal cycles, which hinders the technology in areas like micro-combined heat and power.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles

Sentencas: A novel micro combined heat and power system, based on a boiler/hot water heater with integrated micro-tubular flame assisted fuel cells (mT-FFCs), is proposed which requires rapid startup, shutdown and thousands of thermal cycles.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles

Sentencas: A 9 cell mT-FFC stack is developed and operated in a two-stage combustor.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles

Sentencas: Rapid startup and shutdown of the fuel cells is demonstrated.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles

Sentencas: The first-stage combustor is ignited, turned off and re-ignited for a total of 3000 on/off, thermal cycles.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles

Sentencas: A maximum heating rate of 966 degrees C.min(-1) and a maximum cooling rate of 353 degrees C.min(-1) is achieved while thermal cycling.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles

Sentencas: Despite the presence of CO in the exhaust, the anode remains porous and crack free after similar to 150 h of thermal cycling testing.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles

Sentencas: The mT-FFC stack continues to generate significant power, even after completing the cycling test, and a low voltage degradation rate is reported.
Titulo: Performance investigation of a micro-tubular flame-assisted fuel cell stack with 3,000 rapid thermal cycles
